channel.title: My new laptop (That I am going to get)
channel.description:
I think I found me a good laptop! Check it out and tell me what you think.
http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Samsung+-+Laptop+with+Intel%26%23174%3B+Core%26%23153%3B+i5+Processor+-+Red/Black/9728443.p?id=1218161511080&skuId=9728443&st=gaming%20laptop&contract_desc=null

item.title: My new laptop (That I am going to get)
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Ye, Lin I have to get a nice monitor (which will come with speakers), a keyboard, a mouse. I already have a wireless adapter, and I thought it said it has one built in, in the specifications.

Justing I am guessing you live in the UK?

Read full topic

@justinxg27 wrote:

item.source: My new laptop (That I am going to get)

item.title: My new laptop (That I am going to get)
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Wow, you were gonna spend $1000 on the laptop you were originally thinking? What a rip! Yes, go with that computer. You’re still going to have to purchase speakers, a webcam, keyboard, monitor, mouse, and wireless network adapter to match the laptop’s accessories, but it’s worth it. I’m sure you have everything you already need anyway.

Read full topic
item.source: My new laptop (That I am going to get)

item.title: My new laptop (That I am going to get)
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Ye I found a new one. I will get a way better computer if I spend my money on a desktop. Instead of a $1000 4gb RAM for a laptop I can spend $1000 dollars on a desktop and get 8gbs of RAM and better graphics speed and everything.

Here is the desktop I want ( and am going to get if they don’t come out with a better one)

http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Dell+-+Studio+XPS+Desktop+with+Intel%26%23174%3B+Core%26%23153%3B+i7+Processor/9697488.p?id=1218153426530&skuId=9697488&st=Gaming%20Computer&contract_desc=null

look at the specifications and compare them to how much better they are then the laptop.

Read full topic

item.title: My new laptop (That I am going to get)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Buy a PC Case, Quad-Core Processor / i7, get a cracked Windows 7 Ultimate, steal 8gb ram from your school [what i did lolol], steal a motherboard [crack open pc with a baseball bat], steal your school’s Network harddrive and steal a bunch of mice and keyboard
THERE YOU GO
4 x 2.5ghz Motherboard with Win 7, 2tb network space[hard drive] and 8GB ram, how hard was that?

http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Gateway+-+Laptop+with+AMD+Athlon%26%23153%3B+II+Dual-Core+Processor+-+NightSky+Black/9732722.p?id=1218162980323&skuId=9732722

item.source: My new laptop (That I am going to get)

item.title: My new laptop (That I am going to get)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Looking very good, same processor and RAM as my Dell, graphics card isn’t quite as good but it’s still very good value for money.

Take a look at the benchmarks of that graphics card: http://www.notebookcheck.net/NVIDIA-GeForce-GT-330M.22437.0.html

Scroll down a little, as you can see, it’ll play Sims 3 in max settings at a fairly decent 49fps, and MW2 maxed out at 30fps, not great, but it’s playable, and of course, can always lower the settings a little.
I’d go for it man, it’s good for the price.

Read full topic
